name: Amigo Extensions
author: amigothemes

sections.description:
Amigo extension is to increase the awesome of our themes created by Amigo Themes. The main use of this plugin is to increase the functionality and features of amigo themes with a smooth user experience. This helps us to add a homepage and other functionality to the website. so you can build amazing websites that are suitable for business, portfolio, blogging & agency websites. You can see below listed free themes.

Features

Slider Section
About Section
Service Section
Blog Section
ect.

License

Amigo Extension WordPress plugin, Copyright (C) 2021 Amigothemes
Amigo Extension WordPress plugin is licensed under the GPL3 (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html).

1.0.16

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.1

1.0.15

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.0

1.0.14

  • Added icon setting in the about section

1.0.13

  • Tested up to WordPress 5.9

1.0.12

  • We have updated the default setting of the info section in the industri theme.

1.0.11

  • We have fixed homepage and widgets issues in industri theme.

1.0.10

  • We have added industri child theme files

1.0.9

  • We have fixed slider text color issue.
  • Tested up to WordPress 5.8.2

1.0.8

  • We have fixed all issue

1.0.7

  • We have added corpox child theme files

1.0.6

  • Customizer section updated

1.0.5

  • Css issue fixed

1.0.4

  • Customizer repeater control issue fixed

1.0.3

  • Aqwa theme mobile menu issue fixed.

1.0.2

  • Added Stable tag readme file.

1.0.0

  • Initial plugin submit to WordPress.org
